de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution

Interface Distribution

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDistribution, BetaDistribution, CauchyDistribution, ChiDistribution, ChiSquaredDistribution, ConstantDistribution, ExponentialDistribution, ExponentiallyModifiedGaussianDistribution, GammaDistribution, GeneralizedExtremeValueDistribution, GeneralizedLogisticAlternateDistribution, GeneralizedLogisticDistribution, GeneralizedParetoDistribution, GumbelDistribution, HaltonUniformDistribution, InverseGaussianDistribution, KappaDistribution, LaplaceDistribution, LogGammaAlternateDistribution, LogGammaDistribution, LogisticDistribution, LogLogisticDistribution, LogNormalDistribution, NormalDistribution, PoissonDistribution, RayleighDistribution, SkewGeneralizedNormalDistribution, StudentsTDistribution, UniformDistribution, WeibullDistribution

    public interface Distribution
    Statistical distributions, with their common functions.
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
